```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
train <- read.csv('data-train.csv')
```

```{r}
train
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = train, mapping = aes(x = St)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = train, mapping = aes(x = Re, y = R_moment_1)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = train, mapping = aes(x = Re, y = R_moment_2, color = factor(Fr))) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = train, mapping = aes(x = St, y = R_moment_1, color = factor(Fr))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, se = F)
```

```{r}
train_data <- train %>% 
  mutate(Fr = as.factor(Fr)) %>% 
  mutate(Re = as.factor(Re))

lm1 <- lm(log(R_moment_1) ~ log(St) + Re + Fr + St*Fr + Re*Fr, data = train_data)
summary(lm1)

lm2 <- lm(log(R_moment_2) ~ log(St) + Re + Fr + St*Fr + Re*Fr, data = train_data)
summary(lm2)

lm3 <- lm(log(R_moment_3) ~ log(St) + Re + Fr + St*Fr + Re*Fr, data = train_data)
summary(lm3)

lm4 <- lm(log(R_moment_4) ~ log(St) + Re + Fr + St*Fr + Re*Fr, data = train_data)
summary(lm4)
```
```{r}
plot(lm1)
```
